-e ---

𒄯 𒊏 The Urra=hubullu (𒄯𒊏 𒄷𒇧𒈝 ur5-ra — ḫu-bul-lu4) is a major Babylonian canonical glossary

𒄯𒊏 Urra=hubullu
𒄯𒊏 ur5-ra and ḫubullu meaning "interest-bearing debt"
𒄯𒊏 | debt | qer къарз q̇̄arz قەرز qerz
𒄯𒊏 | debt | χρέος chréos
𒄯𒊏 | debt | декхар deqar
𒄯𒊏 | debt | бурыс burïs борыш borış борг borh ⇔ borrow Tocharian B: peri бурж burž Turk: borç √borgen պարտք partkʿ
𒄯𒊏 | debt | •Bir.ra ha.birra ⇔ ḫubullu obulus obligation обя́занность objázannostʹ
𒄯𒊏 | debt | •mur.ra მოვალეობა (movaleoba)
